LocaleLayout.title: Gabriela Cruz | software engineering and technology

HomePage.title: Gabriela Cruz | software engineering and technology
HomePage.hero: hi! i'm Gabi, a Software Developer from Rio de Janeiro.

About.title: About
About.text:
Graduated with a Technical Diploma at the Secondary Level in I.T from CEFET/RJ, I discovered my passion for technology early on. During this period, I built a strong foundation in algorithms, data structures, and programming logic, working on my first projects.

Nowadays, I'm pursuing a degree in Computer Science at the State University of Rio de Janeiro, where I continuously deepen my understanding and enhance my technical expertise. I work as a Software Developer at the largest broadcaster in Latin America, building a fully integrated pipeline from the ground up for company's Visual Effects department.

Feel free to reach out on my social media to chat about technologyâ€”or anything else!

companies.name: Globo
companies.description: I work on the development of a Pipeline application for process control in VFX, using Python to create agile solutions that improve performance, organization, and productivity. I actively participate in the project architecture from end to end, from service orchestration with Docker to the implementation of cloud computing on Google Cloud Platform. Additionally, I work with databases, both NoSQL (Firestore) and relational databases like MySQL. I also play an active role in strategic decisions related to design patterns, contributing to the system architecture definition. Furthermore, I assist in understanding the software's business rules and its documentation, ensuring development aligned with the team's and company's needs.

companies.name: Descomplica
companies.description: I worked on different development fronts, focusing on SEO, user experience, and microservices architecture. In the SEO team, I worked on optimizing performance and usability of websites, aiming to improve metrics and search engine indexing. For this, I used React and advanced front-end strategies, collaborating directly with SEO analysts to enhance user experience and accessibility. I also contributed to the team responsible for the assessments system of the graduation platform, developing solutions with GraphQL and MongoDB. I worked with Nest.js in a microservices architecture and Vue.js and React in microfrontends. This work focused on providing a smooth and intuitive experience for students, in partnership with the design team. Additionally, I had experience with CI/CD tools such as Jenkins, participating in error investigation and debugging in development and production environments. I also used Grafana and Sentry to monitor applications, analyze metrics, and help identify failures to ensure system stability.

companies.name: Concilie Online
companies.description: I worked on the development of a CRM using Python and the Django framework integrated with a MySQL database, creating new features and performing maintenance. Additionally, I implemented RESTful APIs and integrated technologies like WebSocket for real-time communication. Regarding infrastructure, I gained experience with the AWS cloud computing environment and its functionalities. I also actively participated in strategic meetings to define new solutions based on requirements gathering.
